text: Bob Andy pie is a sweet pie. It is similar to a custard pie that is spiced with cinnamon and cloves. It is often said to have originated among the Amish and is named for two legendary gelding workhorses. ==See also== * List of pies, tarts and flans ==Notes== Category:Sweet pies Category:American pies Category:Custard desserts Category:Pennsylvania Dutch cuisine
title: Bob Andy pie
